Localization.Name: Stoic Suppressor1
Localization.Description:
Manufacturer: ArmaMod
Type: Suppressor
Attachment Point: Barrel
Size: 1

Spread: +20%
Horizontal Aim Recoil: -45%
Vertical Aim Recoil: -15%
Visual Recoil: -33%
Recoil Time: -20%
Audible Range: -33%

Featuring a more spacious chamber that widens shot spread, the Stoic Suppressor1's increased size reduces noise while allowing for superior recoil control.
